entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the Weasley twins who are practicing magic with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is getting good at disarming spells and also remembers something important.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the sister of Ron Weasley and is talking to Harry about Percy's secret relationship.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as having a secret girlfriend, Penelope Clearwater.

entities.name: penelope clearwater
entities.description: Penelope Clearwater is mentioned as Percy's secret girlfriend and a Ravenclaw Prefect.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the Weasley twins who drops books on George's head.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone Harry is talking to on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone Harry is talking to on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: king's cross
entities.description: King's Cross is mentioned as a location where Harry and his friends are almost at.

entities.name: harry's filibuster fireworks
entities.description: Harry's Filibuster Fireworks are mentioned as something George's is practicing with.

entities.name: the hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is mentioned as a vehicle that slows and finally stops.
